introSection.title: Hi, I'm Rene.
introSection.textContent: I am a young full-stack web developer who likes to build performant and beautiful web applications and interfaces using various JavaScript frameworks.

sectionDoing.title: What I'm doing
sectionDoing.content: I'm building front-end web applications with various JavaScript frameworks. Mostly I'm working with Vue.js and Node.js.
